references.reason: This paper introduces the foundation of diffusion probabilistic models, a core concept upon which the current work builds and improves.
This paper provides a crucial theoretical understanding of the denoising diffusion process, which is directly applied and enhanced in this work.

references.paper_title: Elucidating the design space of diffusion-based generative models
references.reason: This paper explores the design space of diffusion models and informs the strategic choices in model selection and parameter tuning.

references.paper_title: Zigzag diffusion sampling: Diffusion models can self-improve via self-reflection
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of self-reflection in diffusion models, a crucial idea leveraged and extended in this work.

references.paper_title: Human preference score v2: A solid benchmark for evaluating human preferences of text-to-image synthesis
references.reason: This paper provides a critical benchmark for evaluating human preferences in image generation, used to evaluate the improvements achieved in this work.
